attributes.action: Create a green tax on all inported manufactured goods from outside the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This tax would apply to manufactuerd goods only. It is common knowledge that cheap inports are made in areas of the world where and concept of green thinking is ignored. Add to this the enviromental cost of transport it makes sense to produce locally. All locally manufactured good are easier to monitor in repect of the enviroment. The money raised should be used to ease the burden on the tax payer. The knock on effect of locally made products would lead to increased employment at the unskilled and semi skilled level.
The ideal place for youg people with out any qualifications to get a start in life. Who needs the streets when you have JOB.
